title: ambA manam
sahitya:
ambA manam kanindunadu kaDaik-kaN pAr tiruvaDiyiNai tuNai enad-


anupallavi

  vempava nOyara anbar tamakkaruL kadamba vanak-kuyilE shankari jagad-


caraNam    paintamizh malarp-pAmAlai shUDi un pAda malar paNindhu pADavum vENDum
cintaiyum en nAvum ennEramum nin tirup-peyar pugazh maravAmaiyum vENDum
bandha ulagil mati mayangi aru paghaivar vashamAi azhiyAmal aruL pera vENDum
inda varam taruvAy jagadIshvari endhn annaiyE akhilANDa nAyaki en
